task_name: Convert Angular code to React code
query_example: Sample Angular -> React Query: Convert the following Angular component into a React component. The Angular component is a simple input field with a button that displays the input text. @Component({ selector: 'app-input', template: '<input [(ngModel)]="text" /> <button (click)="showText()">Show Text</button>', styles: [] }) export class InputComponent { text: string = ''; showText() { alert(this.text); } }
